feed.title: A Comparison Of LN and Drivechain Security In The Presence Of 51% Attackers

entry.title: A Comparison Of LN and Drivechain Security In The Presence Of 51% Attackers
entry.summary: In an email conversation between Paul and ZmnSCPxj, a "quiz" was presented to test one's understanding of Drivechain. Questions and answers were provided for each question. The questions included topics such as the security model, withdrawal system, and potential drawbacks of Drivechain. Some questions had alternative answers that could be considered acceptable, while others were deemed incorrect or not fully answered. The quiz aimed to identify those who are knowledgeable about Drivechain.
